definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: USCG missions are clearly defined in 'legal authorities' by the US Congress.
sentences.chinese: 美國國會以法定形式清楚地定義了USCG的使命。

sentences.english: It protects US officials there and guards visiting congressional delegations.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，它保護美國官員和來訪的美國國會代表團。

sentences.english: The company was chartered by the US Congress in 1970.
sentences.chinese: 房地美公司在1970年由美國國會授權特許經營。

sentences.english: Several demonstrations took place peacefully at security check points near the U. S. Capitol building.
sentences.chinese: 在美國國會大廈附近的安檢站也發生了幾次和平示威。

sentences.english: Congressman Gilman served 15 terms, a total of 30 years in the U.S. Congress.
sentences.chinese: 格爾曼先生在美國國會服務15任，共30年。

sentences.english: The U.S. Congress returns to work Monday.
sentences.chinese: 美國國會將於星期一復會。

sentences.english: 1862 - Medal of Honor authorised by the United States Congress.
sentences.chinese: 1862年的今天，美國國會通過頒發榮譽勳章。

sentences.english: Congress passed the Egg Products Inspection Act (EPIA) in 1970.
sentences.chinese: 美國國會在1970年通過了《蛋製品檢測法》。

sentences.english: In nineteen eighty-six, Congress chose the rose as America's national flower.
sentences.chinese: 1986年，美國國會選擇了玫瑰作爲國花。

sentences.english: Apologies for government mistreatment and reparations have been rare in Congress.
sentences.chinese: 美國國會爲政府不公平待遇道歉甚至賠款相當罕見。

sentences.english: The Library of Congress holds more than 700 books on the subject of the White House.
sentences.chinese: 美國國會圖書倌藏有超過700本論及白宮的書。

sentences.english: The increased funding would require approval from a balky Congress.
sentences.chinese: 增加融資可能需要得到固執的美國國會批准。

sentences.english: The KORUS agreement has yet to receive final approval from U.
sentences.chinese: 韓美協議尚未得到美國國會的最終批准。

sentences.english: S. nonresidential design and construction industry. That's what the stimulus plan amounts to.
sentences.chinese: 這就是美國國會通過的經濟刺激計劃開出的數額。

sentences.english: The killing continued to reverberate in Congress.
sentences.chinese: 這個槍殺事件繼續在美國國會引起反響。

sentences.english: Congress, meanwhile, can resolve the problem of orphan books.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，美國國會也能解決孤兒書的問題。

definition: Taiwanese variant of 奧巴馬|奥巴马[Ao4 ba1 ma3], Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
to swear the oath of office

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1
